title: Trump gives green light to Nvidia to ship powerful AI chips to China
description: The US government will allow Nvidia  to export its H200 artificial intelligence chips to China, collecting a fee for each chip, President Trump said Monday.
content:
The US government will allow Nvidia to export its H200 artificial intelligence chips to China, collecting a fee for each chip, President Trump said Monday.

title: Cursor internal AI Help Desk handles 80% of employees' support tickets
description: The AI coding-assistant start-up isn't just using artificial intelligence to help developers write code, it's deploying AI across its own internal operations, CEO Michael Truell said at Fortune's Brainstorm AI conference.
content: Truell said the company had already automated roughly 80% of its customer support tickets with the help of the technology. He said the company had also implemented an internal AI-powered communication system that allows employees to query information... [2676 chars]

title: US FDA qualifies first AI tool to help speed liver disease drug development
description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has qualified the first artificial intelligence tool designed to help doctors assess a severe form of fatty liver disease in drug trials, the agency said on Monday.
content:
Dec 8 (Reuters) - The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has qualified the first artificial intelligence tool designed to help doctors assess a severe form of fatty liver disease in drug trials, the agency said on Monday.
Now, the tool will be publicl... [1271 chars]

title: Google's First AI Smart Glasses Coming in 2026
description: Google is developing two pairs of smart glasses with artificial intelligence that will launch in 2026, the company said today. The first set of glasses have AI integration and are designed for screen-free assistance with built-in speakers, microphones, and cameras for speaking to Google Gemini. Users will be able to take photos using the camera, and then ask Gemini questions about their surroundings for real-time help.

title: Trump Allows Sale Of Powerful Nvidia Chip Shipments To China Despite Security Concerns
description: The U.S. government will allow Nvidia to export its H200 artificial intelligence chips to China, Trump said.

title: Trump approves sale of advanced chips to China
description: U.S. President Donald Trump said Monday that he would allow Nvidia to sell an advanced type of computer chip used in the development of artificial intelligence to “approved customers” in China.
content:

title: Workshop on ‘AI Perspective in Data Analytics’ begins at JU
description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Dec 8: The University of Jammu inaugurated a one-week workshop titled “SPSS UNPLUGGED: AI Perspective in Data Analytics”, organized by the College Development Council in collaboration with the Department of Statistics under RUSA 2.0. Prof Neelu Rohmetra, Dean of Research Studies, University of Jammu, graced the occasion as the chief guest. In her keynote address, she highlighted the transformative role of data analytics and artificial intelligence in reshaping the contours of higher education. She noted that these […]
